ServiceCrew.name: ServiceCrew
ServiceCrew.description: Represents a group of service resources who can be assigned to service appointments as a unit.

CrewSize.description: The number of members on the crew. This field is manual, so it doesnâ€™t auto-update when you add or remove members.

LastReferencedDate.description: The date when the service crew was last modified. Its label in the user interface is Last Modified Date.

LastViewedDate.description: The date when the service crew was last viewed.

Name.description: The name of the service crew. For example, Repair Crew.

OwnerId.description: The crew owner. By default, the owner is the person who created the service crew.
